item.title: Wafaa add a quote by سيد قطب
item.description: "إننا نعيش لأنفسنا حياة مضاعفة، حينما نعيش للآخرين، وبقدر ما نضاعف إحساسنا بالآخرين نضاعف إحساسنا بحياتنا، ونضاعف هذه الحياة ذاتها في النهاية." -- سيد قطب

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by غسان كنفاني
item.description: "!لك شيء في هذا العالم.. فقم" -- غسان كنفاني

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by William Nicholson
item.description: "We read to know we're not alone." -- William Nicholson

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Wafaa add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa
